name: pitermarx
body:
# GitHib projects

## [Constituga](https://github.com/pitermarx/constituga)
A javascript parser for the portuguese constitution.

## [Durandal-Alert-Widget](https://github.com/pitermarx/Durandal-Alert-Widget)
Durandal + Bootstrap alert widget


ï»¿## [IoC](http://pitermarx.github.io/IoC)
A simple Inversion of Control Container.

## [NCalc2](http://pitermarx.github.io/NCalc2/)
An attempt to bring [NCalc](http://ncalc.codeplex.com/) to github

## [toSource](https://github.com/pitermarx/toSource/)
Naive implementation of [Object.toSource](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/toSource).

## [TimeUtils](https://github.com/pitermarx/TimeUtils)
Some utility classes to interact with Quartz.NET

## [Throttler](http://pitermarx.github.io/Throttler)
A simple Throttle class that can throttle a method with the signature Action<List<T>>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
